text: A local court on Thursday awarded two-year rigorous imprisonment to five students for assaulting and seriously injuring their junior during ragging in 2011. A fine of Rs. 2,000 was imposed on Naeem Sheikh, Devendra Singh, Subhashit Kaithwas, Dharmendra Chourasia and Vicky Gupta. — PTI
title: Five get two-year RI for ragging
